Now All We Need Are Some Reg Codes
yeah can't help you with those ;)  But according to other sources the xbox360/PS2 keys will work but do not quote me on that,

I get the error "Final Fantasy XI has not been installed. Please install Final Fantasy XI before attempting to install Final Fantasy XI: Wings Of The Goddess"

Could this be because I am running an EU version of the game and this is the NA version? Does it really make that much difference?

I managed to fix it! Any EU users that are wishing to download and use this torrent do this:

To use EU Install on US Install, do this:

1. Go to Start->Run: Type 'regedit' and press enter.
2. Navigate to HKEY Local Machine -> Software > PlayOnlineUS, Right click PlayOnlineUS and click Rename.
Note: the key name is HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\PlayOnlineUS\ for 64bit systems.
3. Change the name of PlayOnlineEU to PlayOnlineUS
4. Run AutoRunEx.exe from the EU files.
5. Install WOTG.
6. Back in Regedit, Rename PlayOnlineUS back to PlayOnlineEU.
7. Open POL and register expansion key, do file check, done. PS2 and XBOX keys WORK ON PC INSTALL!!

Great torrent, took a lil while to download but the file is perfect, installed with no problems at all, thanks.

I realize this is a reference to a very old comment, but if there are any other EU users, that have problems installing this due to the "Final Fantasy XI has not been installed. Please install Final Fantasy XI before attempting to install Final Fantasy XI: Wings Of The Goddess"-issue, do this: 

1. Follow the first two steps of Ascasirs guide. 
2. Locate the 0001-file in the PlayOnlineEU InstallFolder (the one that ends in '/FINAL FANTASY XI') and double-click on it.
3. Copy Value data (an install path)
4. Browse to the InstallFolder in the PlayOnlineUS folder.
5. Right-click in the folder and select New>String Value and name it 0001.
6. Paste your copied Value data and click OK.
7. Install the game
